select id,role_name,role_desc,status from sys_role
and status = 1
and role_name like concat('%',#{params.roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and role_desc like concat('%',#{params.roleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and status = #{params.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select sr.id,sr.role_name,sr.role_desc,sr.status,sr.created_by, sr.created_time,sr.updated_by,sr.updated_time from sys_role sr left join ( select role_id,group_concat(user_id) userIds from user_role group by role_id ) ur on sr.id = ur.role_id
and instr(concat(',',ur.userIds,','),concat(',',#{param.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},','))
left join ( select role_id,group_concat(permission_id) permissionIds from role_permission group by role_id ) rp on sr.id = rp.role_id
and instr(concat(',',rp.permissionIds,','),concat(',',#{param.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},','))
and ( sr.role_name like concat('%',#{param.searchVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or sr.role_desc like concat('%',#{param.searchVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
order by
ur.userIds desc,
rp.permissionIds desc,
sr.created_time
